definition: دك dakka u (dakk) to make flat, level or even, to smooth, level, ram, stamp, tamp (هـ earth, the ground, a road); to press down, weigh down; to beat down; to devastate, demolish, destroy, ruin (هـ s.th.) II to mix, mingle (ه s.th.) VII to be crushed; to be leveled دك dakk pl. دكوك dukūk level ground; -- devastation, demolition, destruction دك II to provide (هـ trousers) with a waist-band (dikka or tikka)
